about.summary: Easy to use mocking, stubbing and spying framework.

name: chai
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "1.1.1" %}

package:
  name: chai
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: chai-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/c/chai/chai-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 7489a1124c780972ef383b2930fc9307afe8667d009fcaf69d97b29ce370d304

build:
  number: 0
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python

test:
  imports:
    - chai

about:
  home: https://github.com/agoragames/chai
  license: BSD 3-Clause
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: 'Easy to use mocking, stubbing and spying framework.'
  license_family: BSD

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - bollwyvl 
    - ocefpaf
